General.Name: Talon Metals Corp
General.Description: Talon Metals Corp., a mineral exploration company, explores for and develops mineral properties. The company owns a 51% interest in the Tamarack nickel-copper-cobalt project located in Minnesota, the United States. It has an option to acquire 80% interest in the mineral rights over a land package covering an area of approximately 4,00,000 acres located in the Upper Peninsula of the State of Michigan. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Road Town, the British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: Craigmuir Chambers, Road Town, British Virgin Islands, VG1110
